description.value:
Brings Good luck, if something bad happens, it might not happen to you

Requirements

Up to GM fiat. Note: Suggestion, on player with charm targeted by any random source of harm, roll 1d10, on a 1, randomly choose someone else if possible.

Effect: Average

Notes: Varies T 6 R
description.summary: Brings Good luck, if something bad happens, it might not happen to you

system.effect: Brings Good luck, if something bad happens, it might not happen to you
